<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Needle of Vengeance](/Spells.aspx?ID=801)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Vengeance](/Lessons.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 enemy
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a specifically forbidden creature. Name yourself or one of your allies. The target takes 2 mental damage any time it uses a hostile action against the named creature.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2.
name: Needle of Vengeance
